belief: The universe is infinite. Humans are insignificant. That's OK.
Humans exist to explore the universe.
A complete theory of the universe should predict all phenomenon in it. We are not close to such a theory.
Humans understand virtually nothing of the universe. Almost nothing has been discovered or invented yet.
The universe is not deterministic or predetermined. Every event has a probability of happening.
The approximate present does not predict the approximate future. The universe is a complex, adaptive system.
Our actions, and interactions, shape the universe. Humans influence outcomes difference.
Consciousness is an emergent property of matter.
There exists natural concepts that are universal across languages and cultures.
I continuously evolve my world model based on subjective conscious experiences.
